13  package net.sf.oval.test.constraints;
14  
15  import junit.framework.Assert;
16  import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURLCheck;
17  import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertURLCheck.URIScheme;
18  
19  /**
20   * @author Makkari
21   *
22   */
23  public class AssertURLTest extends AbstractContraintsTest
24  {
25  	private static final URIScheme[] PERMITTED_SCHEMES = {URIScheme.FTP, URIScheme.HTTP, URIScheme.HTTPS};
26  
27  	public void testAssertURL()
28  	{
29  		final AssertURLCheck check = new AssertURLCheck();
30  		super.testCheck(check);
31  		Assert.assertNull(check.getPermittedURISchemes());
32  
33  		check.setPermittedURISchemes(AssertURLTest.PERMITTED_SCHEMES);
34  		final URIScheme[] actualPermittedSchemes = check.getPermittedURISchemes();
35  		Assert.assertNotNull(actualPermittedSchemes);
36  		Assert.assertEquals(AssertURLTest.PERMITTED_SCHEMES.length, actualPermittedSchemes.length);
37  		for (int n = 0; n < AssertURLTest.PERMITTED_SCHEMES.length; n++)
38  		{
39  			Assert.assertEquals(AssertURLTest.PERMITTED_SCHEMES[n], actualPermittedSchemes[n]);
40  			Assert.assertEquals(AssertURLTest.PERMITTED_SCHEMES[n].toString(), actualPermittedSchemes[n].getScheme());
41  		}
42  
43  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isConnect());
44  		check.setConnect(true);
45  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isConnect());
46  
47  		check.setConnect(false);
48  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, null, null, validator));
49  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "http", null, validator));
50  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "https", null, validator));
51  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "ftp", null, validator));
52  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "http://www.google.com", null, validator));
53  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "https://www.google.com", null, validator));
54  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "httPs://www.google.com", null, validator));
55  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "ftp://ftp.is.co.za/rfc/rfc1808.txt", null, validator));
56  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "ptth://www.google.com", null, validator));
57  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "http://www.g[oogle.com", null, validator));
58  
59  		check.setConnect(true);
60  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, null, null, validator));
61  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "http", null, validator));
62  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "https", null, validator));
63  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "ftp", null, validator));
64  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "http://www.google.com", null, validator));
65  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "https://www.verisign.com/site-map/index.html", null, validator));
66  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "http://127.0.0.1:34343", null, validator));
67  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "http://www.checkupdown.com/accounts/grpb/B1394343/", null,
68  				validator));
69  		Assert.assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(this, "ftp://ftp.debian.org/debian/README.html", null, validator));
70  		Assert.assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(this, "ftp://ftp.debian.org/debian/foo.html", null, validator));
71  
72  		check.setPermittedURISchemes(null);
73  	}
74  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
